title: Danna ga Nani wo Itteiru ka Wakaranai Ken
title_en: I Can't Understand What My Husband Is Saying
title_jp: 旦那が何を言っているかわからない件
synopsis: Hajime Tsunashi is an otaku shut-in that runs a blog, attends anime conventions with his cross-dressing younger brother, and is a surprisingly good cook. Kaoru Tsunashi is a hard-working, smoking, socially-drinking office lady with an overprotective father. Despite coming from two completely different worlds, these two couldn't be more in love with one another… even if she has trouble understanding the vast and complicated world of anime and manga that her husband is deeply entrenched within.
